title: [River's Rest, Citizen Clerk]
description: The rear wall of this small office is dominated by a massive oaken scroll cabinet.  A long counter bisects the room.  On the east wall hangs a small painting of a seascape.  Moonlight leaks in through an open window.

The rear wall of this small office is dominated by a massive oaken scroll cabinet.  A long counter bisects the room.  On the east wall hangs a small painting of a seascape.  Sunlight pours through an open window, which carries the sounds and smells of a nearby creek.
